about_the_game:
With this DLC, you will no longer have to click manually. The No More Clicks DLC adds an auto-click function to the game even when minimized, allowing you to collect with ease.ve to click manually.

New features:
  • The game clicks by itself
  • Click speed limit of 100 ms
  • Can minimize the window
  • Works online
detailed_description:
